name: R√©sum√© quotidien des nouvelles : R√©sumer les flux RSS avec OpenAI et les envoyer √† WhatsApp
description:

D√©clencheur de planification
D√©marrez le workflow selon votre emploi du temps souhait√© (quotidien, horaire, etc.).

Flux RSS (Mon RSS 01‚Äì04)
R√©cup√®re des articles de quatre sources RSS diff√©rentes.

üü® Remarque : Vous pouvez ajouter autant de flux RSS que vous le souhaitez.

Modifier les champs (Modifier les champs 1‚Äì3)
Normalise les champs RSS (titre, lien, etc.) pour garantir la coh√©rence entre diff√©rentes sources.

parameters.content:
## About Limit
limits the analysis to the 10 most recent articles

## About RSS
You can add how many RSS you want

## About Resum
you can send to your whatsapp api, or email, drive...

## About Trgger
Set trigger how you wish

## System message (change if you want)
I've received 10 news articles via RSS. Please analyze them and provide a concise summary of the top 3 to 5 main highlights. My goal is to get a quick overview of what's most relevant in these articles.

data.details: The Filter node can be used to filter items based on a condition. If the condition is met, the item will be passed on to the next node. If the condition is not met, the item will be omitted. Conditions can be combined together by AND(meet all conditions), or OR(meet at least one condition).
